Room.Name: Altar of Maglubyet
Room.ShortDescription: This is the large altar dedicated to Maglubyet and maintained by the priests.
Room.LongDescription: Only a few select goblins are ever allowed in here, and no outsider has ever lived to leave this room. A blood altar stands ready for its next victim. A low, stone table is near the altar, and its top is covered with various small hand instruments of vivisection. As you look closely at the altar you see it has straps to hold the victim in place, and a silver urn to collect the blood.
